title: Wishes and Tears
description: Faith Donahue’s destiny is fulfilled in the arms of a dashing stranger one hundred years in the past. Doctor Ian Forrester has a young son and socialite fiancée in San Francisco in 1906. He doesn’t anticipate the earthquake that occurs, the upheaval in his life as well as in his city. Faith Donahue enters his life and becomes the governess to his beloved son. A scientific man, he questions her claim to be from the future, yet her gift of prophesy prevents personal tragedy. She is mysterious as well as alluring. Can love really transcend time?
author: Nancy Loyan
